title: Take action or we will: SC to govt on Manipur video
comments:
Modi has already taken action. He expressed his outrage and has asked ALL states to provide security to women. Matter closed

Nothing that Modi will do now will suffice. The women who have suffered can never get back their lives. This is all on Modi

Words words words words words.
The best time to do anything was about two months ago.

Just because the internet was blocked does not mean that gov and institutions did not know the ground reality. Now that everyone is neck deep in shit they start pointing fingers.

Gimme a break
I would like to state the Kejriwal meme *toh kar na* here. Take action, mofo government isn't doing shit!
Modi has tweeted about it and other BJP members so thats an action.
